snippet: Ms. Wright discusses her characters on “The Americans” and “The Feud,” and her role in the Lynn Nottage play “Sweat.”...

headline.main: Film 'Trespass Against Us' Sees Fassbender Tackle Family Woes, Crime
headline.print_headline: Film 'Trespass Against Us' Sees Fassbender Tackle Family Woes, Crime

lead_paragraph: Ms. Wright discusses her characters on “The Americans” and “The Feud,” and her role in the Lynn Nottage play “Sweat.”
